mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( USER_EMAIL, USER_NM, USER_PW, USER_JOIN_DT, USER_UPDATE_DT, USER_LOGIN_DT ) VALUES ( #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_NM, USER_JOIN_DT, USER_UPDATE_DT FROM tb_user
SELECT USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_NM, USER_JOIN_DT, USER_UPDATE_DT FROM tb_user WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_NM = #{userName}, USER_PW = #{userPassword}, USER_UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_NM, USER_PW, USER_JOIN_DT, USER_UPDATE_DT, USER_LOGIN_DT FROM tb_user WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
